item.description:
Hi Ladies, 

Join us for an evening of style with Julie Foley, CIP, wardrobe and style consultant.

 

So many women are looking for ways to get their ‘signature look’ AND look like it was not trouble at all. This presentation by Julie Foley will show you how.  Learn from the expert what you need for effortless dressing.

 

Julie is an Image Consultant and has been a member of the prestigious AICI, Association of Image Consultants International, since 1996.  In 2003 she received the designation of CIP, Certified Image Professional.  She holds a BS in Clothing and Textiles from Framingham State College and has over 20 years experience working in the retail industry.

 

As Julie would say, “Be Stylish!”

 

The cost of the venue is $15 per person, payable in cash to Betty Chan at the event.

 

Hope to see you there. 

~Lynne
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess when you arrive.
item.name: 5 Key Pieces to Effortless Dressing
